title: Circles
actors: Aleksandar Bercek, Leon Lucev, Nebojsa Glogovac, Nikola Rakocevic
plot: Five people are affected by a tragic heroic act. 12 years later, each of them will have to confront the past, through their own crisis. Will they overcome the guilt, frustration, urge for revenge? Will they do the right thing, at all costs?
